name: Sinclairs Siliguri

reviews.title: Just another place to stay
reviews.text: I had no expectation - i had reset the level as i was going to Siliguri... after a long long flight - i finally reached bagdogra and spent the day at work in siliguri
I finally reached the hotel in the evening
reviews.title: Perfect Stay

likes.liked: — The Co operative staff and good business meeting facilities.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Not bad

reviews.text: Decent hotel located centrally. Nothing great in terms of rooms and food options. But better than other options in Siliguri. Slightly priced high when compared to service being offered. Safe for single travellers.
reviews.title: Decent hotel

reviews.text: It was the wedding of my friend and we stayed here for a night.
reviews.title: Wedding of a friend

likes.disliked: — not very high standard of rooms

reviews.text: The rooms are not of very high standard but ok. The room service ok .
reviews.title: Great property

reviews.text: The restaurant has timings for the various meals.it has a lovely pool side which of course we did not use in the winters of december.It also has a in house Gym.
reviews.title: Good hotel for Business travel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel doesnot have a designated valet service and it has lot of scope for improvement in service.
reviews.title: Average Hotel expensive for what is was

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel looked awful from the outside but inside it was ok.
reviews.title: Ok hotel, a little pricey for what you get
Peaceful environment
reviews.text: For around RS3000 for a double room it is not cheap but there was a marked difference between this and a hotel i used for RS1000 in Siliguri.

reviews.title: Good Food.Bad Rooms. Pathetic Fitness centre.
reviews.text: Firstly, Siliguri has nothing to offer apart from a hotel to stay in. Most people use it as a point of transfer either out of the airport at Bagdogra or at the NJP train station.

reviews.title: Worst staff no committment value rude and not helpful
reviews.text: We had a double room and it was large, clean and fairly modern. The views were non existent and the dogs barking at night were a pain.
There is a pool that i would never get in !
reviews.title: Just a Beauti

description: Nestled close to the Mahananda River and surrounded by lush greenery, Hotel Sinclairs Siliguri is an ideal destination for both business and leisure. Perhaps the best address in town, Hotel Sinclairs is renowned for professional and attentive service. The 41 well-appointed executive rooms and five luxurious suites are equipped with TVs, direct dial STD telephones and modern amenities. Sinclairs Siliguri is an excellent venue for conferences and meetings. The Emperor, a tastefully decorated board room, The Summit, a stylish banquet hall, The Regency, a medium size conference hall, The Heritage, a large pillar less conference venue and the opulent Darbar Hall with an open air terrace are sure to make your meetings a success. The hotel also has a multi-cuisine restaurant, The Palms, and a trendy lounge bar called the 03. Additional facilities include a swimming pool, gymnasium and spa.
